title: Award-Winning Fiji Savasi Island Luxury with All-Inclusive Dining
description:
An emerald in the ocean just off the coast of Vanua Levu - Fiji’s second-largest island - Savasi Island Resort is an award-winning private island paradise where postcard-perfect beauty awaits. This 52-acre island is carpeted in velvety, palm-fringed rainforest and surrounded by pristine reef and aquamarine waters, where an underwater world lies waiting to be discovered.

Rated among Tripadvisor’s top 1% of properties worldwide, this luxurious boutique resort is home to just ten private villas nestled amid verdant jungle, in addition to five suites aboard Serenity: a 140-foot schooner vessel bobbing gently on the aquamarine waters of the marina. Indulge in a beachside dinner of gourmet cuisine crafted with fresh local ingredients, bliss out with a massage at the spa or in your suite on request, discover secluded beaches and cays or come up close to colourful marine life in the lagoon. Days on this island paradise are yours to design.

vendor_name: Koro Sun Resort and Rainforest Spa
title: Escape to Fiji's Hidden Paradise with All-Inclusive Dining
description:
Unwind where the rainforest meets the reef at Koro Sun Resort & Rainforest Spa - a secluded tropical paradise surrounded by lush forest and cradled by the crystal-clear waters of a private lagoon. Truly immerse yourself in this natural paradise with unlimited access to non-motorised activities, including snorkelling, kayaking, guided rainforest trekking and so much more. This one-of-a-kind resort is located on Vanua Levu, Fiji's second-largest island and an unspoiled, natural paradise with world-famous diving spots.

Treat yourself to a quintessential Fijian escape, staying in a traditional bure and indulge in all-inclusive dining (daily à la carte breakfast, daily two-course lunch, daily afternoon tea and nightly three-course dinner) a daily drink per person and return shared transfers from Savusavu airport.

⏱**Buy now, book later**: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details).
offer_address: Hibiscus Highway, Savusavu, Vanua Levu, Fiji

title: A-List Fiji Stay with All-Inclusive Dining & Drinks
description:
Escape to the pristine beauty of Fiji’s north island with a stay at the A-list Namale Resort & Spa. The multi-award-winning resort - most recently named one of the best of the best of travel in Conde Nast Traveler's 2018 Readers' Choice Awards - is the ultimate all-inclusive holiday destination, and the creation of motivational speaker and celebrity Tony Robbins. Nestled between the rainforest and the breathtaking Koro Sea, Robbins has created the perfect setting for those seeking island serenity. The ultimate escape for the rich and famous, Namale Resort & Spa often plays host to celebrities like Russell Crowe, Mike Myers, Edward Norton and more. 
Live like a VIP with all-inclusive drinks (including alcohol) and dining, and an unforgettable couple’s spa treatment.

vendor_name: Koro Sun Resort and Rainforest Spa
title: Fiji Tropical Waterfront Retreat with Return Airport Transfers & Daily Breakfast, Dinner & Drinks
description:
Escape to a secluded hideaway where lush rainforest meets mystical reef. Surrounded by 160 acres of lush jungle sanctuary and cradled by the cerulean waters of a private lagoon, the location is nothing short of perfection, its bure accommodation with wireless relaxation in mind.

Truly immerse yourself in this natural paradise and awaken each morning to the sounds of native birds and ocean waves before spending the day lazing alongside the stunning infinity pool. Indulge in a treatment at the Rainforest Spa, swim in the surrounding lagoon's spectacular waters or venture to the world-famous diving spots and cascading waterfalls nearby.

With dining across three vibrant restaurants, including authentic Fijian buffet with cultural dance entertainment at Palm Grove restaurant, sensational seafood and steak at Latitude 17, laidback alfresco Sand Bar & Grill restaurant and a selection of bars, you'll be all set to create memories to last a lifetime within this dreamy paradise.
offer_address: Hibiscus Highway, Savusavu, Vanua Levu, Fiji

title: Fiji Award-Winning Adults-Only Retreat with Private Villas
description:
Experience the true meaning of luxury with a romantic adults-only escape at Namale Resort and Spa - an intimate tropical sanctuary on Fiji’s northern island of Vanua Levu, where every detail is taken care of to ensure a blissful, all-inclusive stay like no other. This spectacular five-star sanctuary is perfect for honeymooners and couples.

Leave the real world behind you as you settle in for a heavenly stay amid 525 acres of lush tropical surrounds, with views over the glittering ocean. Each spacious guest bure (Fijian for home) and villa boasts a unique layout, and offer five-star amenities coupled with authentic Fijian architecture, such as traditionally thatched roofs and natural stone showers. Spend your days sipping cocktails by the pool, indulging in world-class culinary delights or embracing your adventurous side with a range of included experiences such as snorkelling, kayaking, waterfall hikes and more, all available at no extra cost.

vendor_name: Koro Sun Resort and Rainforest Spa
title: Oceanfront Vanua Levu Island Sanctuary with Fiji's Only Floating Bures
description: Escape to the secluded tropical hideaway of Koro Sun Resort & Rainforest Spa, where the rainforest meets the reef. Surrounded by 160 acres of lush jungle sanctuary and cradled by the cerulean waters of a private lagoon, spend your days by the infinity pool, indulging in spa treatments, swimming in the lagoon or exploring nearby diving spots. With three vibrant restaurants and lively bars, as well as the country's only floating bures, you'll have everything you need to enjoy unforgettable moments in this dreamy paradise.
offer_address: Hibiscus Highway, Savusavu, Vanua Levu, Fiji
